label: 左方
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: Bugaku compositions were divided into two categories:  Left (sahō), mostly of Chinese origin, and Right (uhō), mostly of Korean origin, with the Left, as usual, considered superior (p. 240n.). [舞楽、右方]
